title: 98: Stephen Brodsky: I Chose Life and Life Happened to Be Guitar
itunes:title: 98: Stephen Brodsky: I Chose Life and Life Happened to be Guitar
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Stephen Brodsky of Cave In

On this episode Stephen and Jeremy talk about the album rollout of Heavy Pendulum, Guns N Roses, Ralph Snart, playing saxophone, seeing Primus / U2, his first band and meeting JR, the importance of Nirvana, how he found hardcore, the genesis of Cave In, learning how to record on a four track, meeting Brian McTernan and working together the first time, how the Gambit split got funded, the first show he ever played, discovering and joining Converge, playing on When Forever Comes Crashing, the headspace for Until Your Heart Stops, Caleb’s contribution and recording Jupiter, Neurosis’s impact, recording Antenna, touring with the Foo Fighters and getting to meet Dave Grohl, recalibrating after being dropped by RCA, the influential spirit of Caleb Scofield, and so much more!

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Stephen answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER
